name: Solar Core (itch)
description:
Fly around and build some planets to destroy stuff with.

Controls:

Xbox controller

Move: Left joystick

Interact: A

Exit host: B

Open Menu: Y

Zoom: LB & RB

Select orbit: LT &RT

Keyboard

Move: WASD

Interact: Space

Exit host: Left control

Open Menu: Tab

Zoom: 1 & 2

Select orbit: LT &RT

CREDITS:

Sound effects from: https://soundimage.org/sfx-scifi/

Imp made music.
